title: Our People | Singapore Institute of Technology
text_lines: The Gift that Keeps on Giving

The ICT cluster includes world-renowned leaders in education, successful PIs on industry-linked research projects, sought-after technical consultants, highly cited and award-winning researchers, and friendly student-focused lecturers.
Together, our diverse mix team of expert educators, researchers, PIs, innovators, and support staff, are dedicated to advancing the applied and innovative mission of SIT.

ICT cluster seeks excellent potential faculty members, researchers and professional officers who share our passion to deliver the highest quality education while seeking opportunities to be involved in impactful and industry-relevant research.

article_texts:
Our People
The ICT cluster includes world-renowned leaders in education, successful PIs on industry-linked research projects, sought-after technical consultants, highly cited and award-winning researchers, and friendly student-focused lecturers.
Together, our diverse mix team of expert educators, researchers, PIs, innovators, and support staff, are dedicated to advancing the applied and innovative mission of SIT.
